posts.post_content:
I have several Cleveland Old Judges for sale or trade as follows:

Tebeau throwing - SGC 20 - $250 dlvd OBO
Tebeau batting - SGC 20 - $250 dlvd OBO
Alberts fielding - SGC 20 - $165 dlvd OBO - note pinhole
McAleer batting - raw - $250 dlvd OBO
McAleer fielding - raw - $200 dlvd OBO
Hogan fielding - raw - $170 dlvd OBO

Cards are priced based on condition, image quality, and difficulty.  Will listen to trade offers as well.  Email or PM with any questions.  Several of these scans are not the greatest and I can get you a better scan and a better description if you are in need of one.  Thanks for looking.

Eric
